body.description: Hello all-day hydration. Infused with murumuru and jojoba oils, this luxe lotion provides 24-hour moisture that soothes, leaving skin feeling soft and smooth. Available in three fabulous fragrances to match your mood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is fantastic! First, it’s a full 13.5 ounces of rich and creamy lotion that smells wonderful (lightly scented, not overpowering or sickly sweet. Gives you a clean and pampered feel). Absorbs well, hydration lasts throughout the day and a little goes a long way. Second is the value; very reasonable price for the size and quality. Third is the packaging; I love that this doesn’t come with a pump that never seems to work. If you’ve got arthritis in your hands as I do, you’ll appreciate the shape of the bottle which is easy to squeeze. The shape also makes it convenient to throw in a tote, gym bag, etc. Also appreciated are the simple, yet stylish, graphics on the bottle itself that blend in with any decor. Plus it’s nice to know I’m not paying extra for someone else’s idea of a fancy looking bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lotion work so well. My skin is so smooth and it smells amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydrates with a lovely light scent.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a body lotion that absorbed quickly with a light scent. This is the stuff! My skin feels hydrated and it's a light and airy formula. It's not to thick and goes on quickly. I will buy it again and try another scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft Rose Scent
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new lotion since my previous try at a new lotion felt like I slapped butter on my body. This method daily lotion smells quite nice and doesn't leave a greasy residue or feel after applying. It absorbs into the skin fast, but I wouldn't say it's super moisturizing. I have pretty dry skin, especially in the winter and with the colder months here, I wouldn't switch out my usual Nivea lotion for this one. While I do enjoy the soft, rose scent, the moisture factor could use some work, but it's not heavily marketed for dry skin so I wouldn't fuss too much over that. It is, however, marketing to moisturize for at least 24-hours and I feel like if you have pretty normal skin, it would work for you. Overall, would utilize as my 'scent' lotion, but not as my 'moisturizing-out-of-the-shower' lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Leaves skin very soft and the smell is sooo good definitely smells floral. My only complaint would be that the scent only lasts a few hours but it does leave my skin soft for at least 24 hrs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars In it for the smell rather than the moisture!
reviews.reviewText: Ok, I love having lotion on my hands so I actually tend to want to smell my hands throughout the day with this lotion on!It smells SO good and it's pretty strong that the scent lasts longer than others.The smell is really its only strong suit but when it comes to moisturizing, I would give it a 5/10, it doesn't work that well to the point where I feel like I have to reapply after a few hours even on places where I don't wash multiple times a day (like my hands).So if you're looking for a really yummy smell this is your lotion, if you're looking to lock in moisture this isn't the lotion for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love this lotion
reviews.reviewText: I'm very picky about my body lotions - don't like them too runny, greasy, sticky or smelly. This one is just right! Scent is very gentle, lotion is easy to apply and it's just the right texture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this wash and lotion. Fresh, clean and smells wonderful.
